house_listing.house_description: Spacious ranch on nice wooded lot (corner of beekman & princess anne rd). Open floor plan, hardwood floors under carpet. Carpet & paint new in 1997. Shows great. Garage workshop + shed. Exterior to house & gar on beekman st. New roof in 1997. Large floored attic. Eat-in kitchen.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Attic Fan, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Capecod Style, CeilingFan(s), Fenced, Ranch Style, Storage Space, Workshop
